meanings.definition: A feature that is shared or presented alongside another feature.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the actor's performance was a standout cofeature.
meanings.sent2: The bonus content on the DVD was a great cofeature.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the cake was the main feature, and the cupcakes were the cofeature.
meanings.sent4: The supporting actor's role was like a cofeature, adding depth to the main character.
meanings.sent5: The special effects were the cofeature that stole the show.

meanings.definition: To feature or highlight together with something else.
meanings.sent1: The new song will cofeature a famous singer.
meanings.sent2: The magazine article will cofeature two popular trends.
meanings.sent3: The art exhibit will cofeature paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent4: The event will cofeature live music and dance performances.
meanings.sent5: The movie will cofeature action-packed scenes and heartfelt moments.
